item.description:
Why be alone on Valentine's Day just because we are single...Lets all get together at Kudeta and spend Valentine's together!! Who knows, with all the love in the air...what may bloom. :)

Kudeta is an Asian fusion restaurant with fantastic food, great atmosphere and servers. There is a very nice bar area as well.

When: Monday February 14, 2011

Where: Kudeta  27 Temple Street in New Haven 

Why: Because we all need a lil love on Valentine's Day...even if it is the love of good friends

 

Sorry for the late posting of this event, but the idea just came to me last night while driving with a friend...so I rushed to pull it together.

Look for other postings to follow tonight for Kellys, Barcelona and Bear and Grill!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: The hostess will show you to the balcony....it's where all the fun loving people are!
item.why: Kudeta is one of my most favorite restaurants in New Haven....with one of the most romantic atmospheres as well. We will have the upper balcony all to ourselves.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Kudeta for all us SINGLE Valentines!!! Maybe love will bloom....
